pageContext.claim: “If you don't do that, that means you will have a president of the United States for four years with his wonderful son, you will have a president who lost all of these states. Or you will have a president, to put it another way, who was voted on by a bunch of stupid people who lost all of these states. You will have an illegitimate president.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump falsely says that Joe Biden, the certified winner of the presidential election, will be an illegitimate president.
